players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie's dead, what does it mean?"
Diana: "I saw Charlie last night, he seemed fine. I don't know what happened."
Bob: "Charlie was a threat to us all, and I took care of him. Don't make the same mistake."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
